name: Fishin
description:
Windows Only. MagicaVoxel, Unity, Google Music Maker used in the creation of this project.

A little interactive scene to practice some free game-making tools.

Use the arrow keys to spin the scene around. Click the character to choose your favorite from four different choices.

Pond plant layout is randomly generated every time - no pond is the same! You can re-generate the plants by clicking the top right button.

A work in progress with plans to add more (like characters, decor, and maybe actual fishing!). Probably a little buggy!
